```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(COVID19)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Examining situation in USA
```{r}
covid_us <- covid19("USA", level =2)

ggplot(covid_us,
       aes(x = date,
           y = confirmed)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~id)
```
